meanings.sent1: The nonreflecting surface of the black hole absorbed all light.
meanings.sent2: The nonreflecting glass made it impossible to see through the window.
meanings.sent3: The nonreflecting mirror played a trick on the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like nonreflecting pools, revealing nothing of her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The nonreflecting paint on the car made it blend seamlessly into the night.

meanings.sent1: The nonreflecting screen on the phone prevented any glare.
meanings.sent2: The nonreflecting surface of the lake made it look like a perfect mirror.
meanings.sent3: The nonreflecting metal seemed to defy the laws of physics.
meanings.sent4: His nonreflecting attitude towards criticism surprised his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The nonreflecting mask hid her true feelings from everyone around her.
